name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo):Injustice in the Middle East Beyond Instagram
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo):Injustice in the Middle East Beyond Instagram
long_desc: This discussionbased course is about tackling and debating injustices in the Middle East socially and politically. This course will look and dive into conversations about Western intervention in involvement in countries such as Palestine and Lebanon, Muslim representation in media, as well as the importance of mental health and other social issues in the Middle East. This class will also be welcoming and encouraging towards all opinions and ideas and everyone is welcome to join.

custom_fields.goals: To inform the public about how these topics that are not often and discussed about are important to understand and grasp.
custom_fields.key_topics: This discussion-based course is about tackling and debating injustices in the Middle East socially and politically. This course will look and dive into conversations about Western intervention in involvement in countries such as Palestine and Lebanon, Muslim representation in media, as well as the importance of mental health and other social issues in the Middle East. This class will also be welcoming and encouraging towards all opinions and ideas and everyone is welcome to join.
custom_fields.relevance: This course is relevant to anyone interested in politics, open to discussions and opinions, and wants to truly understand what is happening in the Middle East.
